testcase.classname: US_26 System should allow to update countries using api end point
testcase.name: TC_2601 User can just update each country 1 by 1
testcase.system-out: Given Use api end point "https://www.gmibank.com/api/tp-countries/"........passed And User finds out the size of the country list.............................passed And User send a Put request endpoint "https://www.gmibank.com/api/tp-countries/" as "Pays-Bas" for upddate Cekya.passed Then User verify the contry was updated.....................................passed
